00048 XMeasure::XMeasure(const char *name, bool runtime) :
00049     XNode(name, runtime),
00050    m_thermometers(create<XThermometerList>("Thermometers", false)),
00051    m_scalarEntries(create<XScalarEntryList>("ScalarEntries", true)),
00052    m_graphList(create<XGraphList>("GraphList", true, scalarEntryList())),
00053    m_chartList(create<XChartList>("ChartList", true, scalarEntryList())),
00054    m_interfaces(create<XInterfaceList>("Interfaces", true)),
00055    m_drivers(create<XDriverList>("Drivers", false, 
00056         scalarEntryList(), interfaceList(), thermometerList())),
00057    m_textWriter(create<XTextWriter>("TextWriter", false, driverList(), scalarEntryList())),
00058    m_rawStreamRecorder(create<XRawStreamRecorder>("RawStreamRecorder", false, driverList())),
00059    m_rawStreamRecordReader(create<XRawStreamRecordReader>("RawStreamRecordReader", false,
00060          driverList())),
00061    m_conRecordReader(xqcon_create<XRawStreamRecordReaderConnector>(
00062             rawStreamRecordReader(),
00063             dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmRecordReader)),
00064    m_conDrivers(xqcon_create<XDriverListConnector>(
00065             m_drivers, dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmDriver)),
00066    m_conInterfaces(xqcon_create<XInterfaceListConnector>(
00067             m_interfaces,
00068             dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmInterface->tblInterfaces)),
00069    m_conEntries(xqcon_create<XEntryListConnector>(
00070             scalarEntryList(), 
00071             dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmScalarEntry->m_tblEntries,
00072             chartList())),
00073    m_conGraphs(xqcon_create<XGraphListConnector>(graphList(),
00074             dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmGraphList->tblGraphs,
00075             dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmGraphList->btnNewGraph,
00076             dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmGraphList->btnDeleteGraph)),
00077    m_conTextWrite(xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(
00078             textWriter()->recording(),
00079             dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmScalarEntry->m_ckbTextWrite)),
00080    m_conTextURL(xqcon_create<XKURLReqConnector>(
00081             textWriter()->filename(),
00082             dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmScalarEntry->m_urlTextWriter,
00083             "*.dat|Data files (*.dat)\n*.*|All files (*.*)", true)),
00084    m_conTextLastLine(xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(
00085             textWriter()->lastLine(),
00086             dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmScalarEntry->m_edLastLine)),
00087    m_conBinURL(xqcon_create<XKURLReqConnector>(
00088             rawStreamRecorder()->filename(),
00089             dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmDriver->m_urlBinRec,
00090             "*.bin|Binary files (*.bin)\n*.*|All files (*.*)", true)),
00091    m_conBinWrite(xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(
00092             rawStreamRecorder()->recording(),
00093             dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmDriver->m_ckbBinRecWrite)),
00094    m_conUrlRubyThread(),
00095    m_conCalTable(xqcon_create<XConCalTable>(
00096             m_thermometers, dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmCalTable)),
00097    m_conNodeBrowser(xqcon_create<XNodeBrowser>(
00098             shared_from_this(), dynamic_cast<FrmKameMain*>(g_pFrmMain)->m_pFrmNodeBrowser))
00099 {
00100   g_statusPrinter = XStatusPrinter::create();
00101    
00102   m_lsnOnReleaseDriver = driverList()->onRelease().connectWeak(
00103         shared_from_this(), &XMeasure::onReleaseDriver); 
00104    
00105   m_ruby = createOrphan<XRuby>("RubySupport", true,
00106     dynamic_pointer_cast<XMeasure>(shared_from_this()));
00107   
00108   m_ruby->resume();
00109 
00110   initialize();
00111 
00112 }
00113 
00114 XMeasure::~XMeasure()
00115 {  
00116    printf("terminate\n");    
00117   m_rawStreamRecordReader->terminate();
00118   m_ruby->terminate();
00119   m_ruby.reset();
00120   g_statusPrinter.reset();
00121 }
00122 void
00123 XMeasure::initialize()
00124 {
00125     if(!thermometerList()->getChild("Raw"))
00126         thermometerList()->create<XRawThermometer>("Raw", true);
00127 }
00128 void
00129 XMeasure::terminate()
00130 {
00131     interfaceList()->clearChildren();
00132     driverList()->clearChildren();
00133     thermometerList()->clearChildren();
00134     initialize();
00135 }
00136 void
00137 XMeasure::stop()
00138 {
00139   atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(driverList()->children());
00140   if(list) { 
00141       for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00142           shared_ptr<XPrimaryDriver> driver = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPrimaryDriver>(*it);
00143           if(driver)
00144             driver->stop();
00145       }
00146   }
00147 }
00148 void
00149 XMeasure::onReleaseDriver(const shared_ptr<XNode> &d)
00150 {
00151     shared_ptr<XDriver> driver = dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(d);
00152     ASSERT( driver );
00153     shared_ptr<XPrimaryDriver> pridriver = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPrimaryDriver>(driver);
00154     if(pridriver)
00155         pridriver->stop();
00156     for(;;) {
00157         shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entry;
00158         atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(scalarEntryList()->children());
00159         if(list) { 
00160             for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00161               shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> _entry = dynamic_pointer_cast<XScalarEntry>(*it);
00162               if(_entry->driver() == driver) {
00163                     entry = _entry;
00164               }
00165             }
00166         }
00167         if(!entry) break;
00168         scalarEntryList()->releaseChild(entry);
00169     }
00170     for(;;) {
00171         shared_ptr<XInterface> interface;
00172         atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(interfaceList()->children());
00173         if(list) { 
00174             for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00175               shared_ptr<XInterface> _interface = dynamic_pointer_cast<XInterface>(*it);
00176               if(_interface->driver() == driver) {
00177                         interface = _interface;
00178               }
00179             }
00180         }
00181         if(!interface) break;
00182         interfaceList()->releaseChild(interface);
00183     }
00184 }
